title: Donji Vrbljani
text: Donji Vrbljani () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Republika%20Srpska">municipality</a> of <a href="Ribnik%2C%20Republika%20Srpska">Ribnik</a>, <a href="Republika%20Srpska">Republika Srpska</a>, <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>.
